scripts.dev:server: cross-env IS_STORAGE_NODE=false NODE_ID=server PORT=50050 ENABLE_HEARTBEAT=false ts-node src/app.ts
scripts.dev:node1: cross-env IS_PRIMARY_NODE=true IS_STORAGE_NODE=true NODE_ID=node1 PORT=50051 ENABLE_HEARTBEAT=true STORAGE_PATH=./nodes ts-node src/start-node.ts
scripts.dev:node2: cross-env IS_STORAGE_NODE=true NODE_ID=node2 PORT=50052 ENABLE_HEARTBEAT=true STORAGE_PATH=./nodes ts-node src/start-node.ts
scripts.dev:node3: cross-env IS_STORAGE_NODE=true NODE_ID=node3 PORT=50053 ENABLE_HEARTBEAT=true STORAGE_PATH=./nodes ts-node src/start-node.ts
